Package creatures

Class Creature

java.lang.Object
creatures.Creature
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Enemy, Player
public abstract class Creature extends Object implements Serializable
This class is common for all creatures in the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • Creature

      public Creature(float startX, float startY, float maxHealth, float speed, float damage, float armor)
      Configures start state of the creature.
      Parameters:
      startX - x coordinate of start position.
      startY - y coordinate of start position.
      maxHealth - max health of the creature.
      speed - speed of the creature.
      damage - speed of the creature.
      armor - speed of the creature.

  • Method Details

    • hurt

      public void hurt(int damage)
      Reduces health by the damage value.
      Parameters:
      damage - health amount to reduce.

      y - y coordinate of new position.
